item.title: Version 1.1.1
item.description: This is a major update with a brand new look and features. - A completely new design and layout. - Several updated booking features. Pay directly to the driver once you're in the taxi. - Switch between your private account and work account. Export your work receipts with ease. - New voucher system. Send trip vouchers to friends and employees. - Make a pre-booking with one of your favourite drivers. - Several other improvements, additions and minor bug fixes.
